mapper.sql: ID, NAME, PROJECT_NUMBER, STATUS, PRINCIPAL, IPONE, LINKMAN, LINKMAN_IPONE, BID_UNIT, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, SUPPLIER_NUMBER, OFFER_STANDARD, PR_INTRODUCE, BUDGET_AMOUNT, PASS_WORD, SCORING_RUBRIC, OPERATOR, DIVISION_OF_WORK, PURCHASE_TYPE, MATERIALS_TYPE, SECTOR_OF_DEMAND, PURCHASE_DEP_ID, DEADLINE, DATE_OF_ENTRUSTMENT, BID_DATE, BID_ADDRESS, REQUIERED_ID,BALE_NO, AMOUNT,DEAL_SUPPLIER,TASK_ID
mapper.select:
select
from T_BSS_PPMS_PROJECTS where 1=1
and NAME like '%${name}%'
and PROJECT_NUMBER like '%${projectNumber}%'
and STATUS like '%${status}%'
ORDER BY DATE_OF_ENTRUSTMENT DESC
mapper.insert: insert into T_BSS_PPMS_PROJECTS (ID, NAME, PROJECT_NUMBER, STATUS, PRINCIPAL, IPONE, LINKMAN, LINKMAN_IPONE, BID_UNIT, ADDRESS, POSTCODE, SUPPLIER_NUMBER, OFFER_STANDARD, PR_INTRODUCE, BUDGET_AMOUNT, PASS_WORD, SCORING_RUBRIC, OPERATOR, DIVISION_OF_WORK, PURCHASE_TYPE, MATERIALS_TYPE, SECTOR_OF_DEMAND, PURCHASE_DEP_ID, DEADLINE, DATE_OF_ENTRUSTMENT, BID_DATE, BID_ADDRESS, REQUIERED_ID,BALE_NO,AMOUNT,DEAL_SUPPLIER,TASK_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkmanIpone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bidUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{offerStandard,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{prIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{budgetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scoringRubric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{divisionOfWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectorOfDemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseDep.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dateOfEntrustment,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{bidAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requieredId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),#{baleNo}, #{amount}, #{dealSupplier.id}, #{task.id})

mapper.update:
update T_BSS_PPMS_PROJECTS
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_NUMBER = #{projectNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRINCIPAL = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IPONE = #{ipone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINKMAN_IPONE = #{linkmanIpone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BID_UNIT = #{bidUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPPLIER_NUMBER = #{supplierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OFFER_STANDARD = #{offerStandard,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PR_INTRODUCE = #{prIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUDGET_AMOUNT = #{budgetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PASS_WORD = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORING_RUBRIC = #{scoringRubric,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIVISION_OF_WORK = #{divisionOfWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATERIALS_TYPE = #{materialsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SECTOR_OF_DEMAND = #{sectorOfDemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PURCHASE_DEP_ID = #{purchaseDep.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEADLINE = #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE},
DATE_OF_ENTRUSTMENT = #{dateOfEntrustment,jdbcType=DATE},
BID_DATE = #{bidDate,jdbcType=DATE},
BID_ADDRESS = #{bidAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REQUIERED_ID = #{requieredId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BALE_NO = #{baleNo},
AMOUNT = #{amount},
DEAL_SUPPLIER = #{dealSupplier.id},
TASK_ID = #{task.id},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_BSS_PPMS_PROJECTS set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROJECT_NUMBER = #{projectNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRINCIPAL = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IPONE = #{ipone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINKMAN_IPONE = #{linkmanIpone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BID_UNIT = #{bidUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTCODE = #{postcode,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPLIER_NUMBER = #{supplierNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OFFER_STANDARD = #{offerStandard,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PR_INTRODUCE = #{prIntroduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUDGET_AMOUNT = #{budgetAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PASS_WORD = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORING_RUBRIC = #{scoringRubric,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIVISION_OF_WORK = #{divisionOfWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATERIALS_TYPE = #{materialsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTOR_OF_DEMAND = #{sectorOfDemand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PURCHASE_DEP_ID = #{purchaseDep.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEADLINE = #{deadline,jdbcType=DATE}, DATE_OF_ENTRUSTMENT = #{dateOfEntrustment,jdbcType=DATE}, BID_DATE = #{bidDate,jdbcType=DATE}, BID_ADDRESS = #{bidAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REQUIERED_ID = #{requieredId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} BALE_NO = #{bidDate}, AMOUNT = #{amount}, DEAL_SUPPLIER = #{dealSupplier.id} TASK_ID = #{task.id} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
